en.bdb: One Universal Creator God. Truth Is The Name. Creative Being Personified. By Guru's Grace:
en.ms: There is but one God. True is His Name and creative His personality. By the Guru's grace He is obtained
en.ssk: One Universal Creator God. Truth Is The Name. Creative Being Personified. By Guru's Grace:

es.sn: Por la Gracia del Ser Supremo, el Eterno, el Todo Prevaleciente Creador,

en.bdb: The company I keep is wretched and low, and I am anxious day and night;
en.ms: Day and night I am infested with the anxiety, that my association is low,
en.ssk: The company I keep is wretched and low, and I am anxious day and night;

es.sn: Mi compañero constante es la maldad; vivo oprimido por este pensamiento.

hi.ss: (हे प्रभू !) दिन रात मुझे ये सोच रहती है (मेरा क्या बनेगा?) बुरे लोगों के साथ मेरा उठना-बैठना है।
hi.sts: हे प्रभु ! मुझे दिन-रात यह चिन्ता लगी रहती है कि मेरी संगति बुरी है (अर्थात् नीच लोगों के साथ मेरा रहन-सहन है),

transliteration.english: meree sa(n)gat poch soch dhin raatee ||
transliteration.hindi: मेरी संगति पोच सोच दिनु राती ॥

transliteration.ur: مےریِ سںگت پوچ سوچ دن راتیِ ۔۔

hi.sts: मुझे मत भुलाओ, मैं तेरा सेवक हूँ॥ १॥ रहाउ ॥

en.ms: Remove my distress and grant unto me, Thy serf, Thine sublime love.

hi.ss: (हे प्रभू !) मेरी ये बिपता काट; मुझ सेवक को अच्छी भावना वाला बना ले;
